comment.language: From the Paramoun of the Nativity to the Feast of the Circumcision:
From the Paramoun of the Nativity to the Feast of the Circumcision:

text.language: Tenouwst m~mok w~ Pi,~rictoc: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma eyouab: je aumack akcw] m~mon nai nan.
We worship You, O Christ, with Your good Father, and the Holy Spirit, for You were born and saved us. Have mercy on us.

language.div: “Ten-u-ousht em-mok o pi-e-khris-tos nem pe-kiout en-a-ga-thos nem pi-ep-nevma eth-u-ab je av-mask ak-souti em-mon nai na-n”
(Kami menyembah-Mu ya Kristus, bersama Bapa-Mu Yang Baik dan Roh Kudus, karena Engkau telah lahir dan menyelamatkan kami, kasihanilah kami.)

text.language: نسجدُ لكَ أيها المسيحُ، معَ أبيكَ الصالحِ والرّوحِ القُدُسِ، لأنكَ وُلِدتَ وخلَّصتَنا. [ارحَمْنا]

comment.language: From Paramoun of the Theophany until the 12th of Tobe:
From Paramoun of the Theophany until the 12th of Tobe:

text.language: Tenouwst m~mok w~ Pi,~rictoc: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma eyouab: je ak[iwmc akcw] m~mon nai nan.
We worship You, O Christ, with Your good Father, and the Holy Spirit, for You were baptized and saved us. Have mercy on us.

language.div: “Ten-u-ousht em-mok o pi-e-khris-tos nem pe-kiout en-a-ga-thos nem pi-ep-nevma eth-u-ab je av-mask ak-souti em-mon nai na-n”
(Kami menyembah-Mu ya Kristus, bersama Bapa-Mu Yang Baik dan Roh Kudus, karena Engkau telah baptis dan menyelamatkan kami, kasihanilah kami.)

text.language: نسجدُ لكَ أيها المسيحُ، معَ أبيكَ الصالحِ والرّوحِ القُدُسِ، لأنكَ أعتمدت وخلَّصتَنا. [ارحَمْنا]

comment.language: On the two Feasts of the Cross, during Holy Pascha Week, and during funerals:
On the two Feasts of the Cross, during Holy Pascha Week, and during funerals:

text.language: Tenouwst m~mok w~ Pi,~rictoc: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma eyouab: je auask akcw] m~mon nai nan.
We worship You, O Christ, with Your good Father, and the Holy Spirit, for You were crucified and saved us. Have mercy on us.

language.div: “Ten-u-ousht em-mok o pi-e-khris-tos nem pe-kiout en-a-ga-thos nem pi-ep-nevma eth-u-ab je av-mask ak-souti em-mon nai na-n”
(Kami menyembah-Mu ya Kristus, bersama Bapa-Mu Yang Baik dan Roh Kudus, karena Engkau telah disalibkan dan menyelamatkan kami, kasihanilah kami.)

text.language: نسجدُ لكَ أيها المسيحُ، معَ أبيكَ الصالحِ والرّوحِ القُدُسِ، لأنكَ صلبت وخلَّصتَنا. [ارحَمْنا]
Tenouwst m~mok w~ Pi,~rictoc: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma eyouab: je aktwnk akcw] m~mon nai nan.
We worship You, O Christ, with Your good Father, and the Holy Spirit, for You have risen and saved us. Have mercy on us.

language.div: “Ten-u-ousht em-mok o pi-e-khris-tos nem pe-kiout en-a-ga-thos nem pi-ep-nevma eth-u-ab je av-mask ak-souti em-mon nai na-n”
(Kami menyembah-Mu ya Kristus, bersama Bapa-Mu Yang Baik dan Roh Kudus, karena Engkau telah bangkit dan menyelamatkan kami, kasihanilah kami.)

text.language: نسجدُ لكَ أيها المسيحُ، معَ أبيكَ الصالحِ والرّوحِ القُدُسِ، لأنكَ قمت وخلَّصتَنا. [ارحَمْنا]

comment.language: On standard days of the year and on fasting days:
On standard days of the year and on fasting days:

text.language: Tenouwst m~mok w~ Pi,~rictoc: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma eyouab: je aki~ akcw] m~mon nai nan.
We worship You, O Christ, with Your good Father, and the Holy Spirit, for You have come and saved us. Have mercy on us.

language.div: “Ten-u-ousht em-mok o pi-e-khris-tos nem pe-kiout en-a-ga-thos nem pi-ep-nevma eth-u-ab je av-mask ak-souti em-mon nai na-n”
(Kami menyembah-Mu ya Kristus, bersama Bapa-Mu Yang Baik dan Roh Kudus, karena Engkau datang dan menyelamatkan kami, kasihanilah kami.)

text.language: نسجدُ لكَ أيها المسيحُ، معَ أبيكَ الصالحِ والرّوحِ القُدُسِ، لأنَّكَ أتيتَ وخلَّصتَنا. [ارحَمْنا]
